result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case called: 3:07pm. INCLUDES 13CF1041, 14CF658, 14CF659, 14CF660, 14CF661, 14CF662, 14CF688.  Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Dave Casey. State moves to DRI 14CF688- crt grants. PSI received by Crt. Defense corrects PSI memoradum. Crt in receipt of Alternative PSI. Both parties in argeement. Victim, C.G. makes statement. Victim, J.B. makes statement. Victim, P.P. makes statement. Crt in receipt of ltr from Victim, K.B.  Arguments by State; Defense. Defendant makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: 13CF1041 - Ct 1 (Burglary/party to)- WI State Prison Total of 5yrs; Initial Confinement 1 yr; Extended Supervisoin 4 yrs. 
Ct 6 (Burglary/party to)-  WI State Prison Total of 5yrs; Initial Confinement 2 yr; Extended Supervisoin 3 yrs. Counts are Consecutive to each to other. COURT ORDERS: On remaining Cases - 14CF658, 14CF659, 14CF660, 14CF661, 14CF662 - WI State Prison Total 5 yrs; Initial Confinement 2 yrs; Extended Supervision 3 yrs. Sentence is concurrent to each other and concurrent to cts 1 & 6 in 13CF1041. 372 days credit. 
EXTENDED SUPERVISION CONDITIONS: Court adopts conditions of PSI on page
to include; 25% of Prison Wages must be paid towards Restitution. Defendant eligible for Challenge Incarceration and Substance Abuse Program. Crt orders and defendant signs Inelligible Voting Form. Copy of CR 234 given to Defendant tomorrow per the Court. PSI & Alternative PSI ordered confidential. COURT ORDERS PSI & Alternative PSI SEALED. Crt remands Defendant to WI State Prison. Adjourned: 4:14pm.
